news.title: Google’s subscriptions rise in Q4 as YouTube pulls $60B in yearly revenue
news.summary: The company said it now has 325 million paying users across Google One and YouTube Premium, up from 300 million users three months earlier.

news.title: Spotify ventures into physical book sales, adds new audiobook features
news.summary: Spotify users in the U.S. and the UK will soon be able to buy physical books in the app. There's also a new tool that syncs physical books to audiobooks.

news.title: Sam Altman got exceptionally testy over Claude Super Bowl ads
news.summary: He posted a novella-sized rant that devolved into to calling his rival "dishonest" and "authoritarian."

news.title: As it preps Specs for the masses, Snap’s Q4 shows revenue growth but fewer daily users
news.summary: The company is engaged in a strategy to diversify its revenue sources as it heads into the new year.

news.title: Mundi Ventures closes on €750M for Kembara, its largest deep tech and climate fund
news.summary: Spain-based deeptech and climate megafund Kembara has just completed a €750 million first close toward its €1 billion target.

news.title: Spotify’s Page Match syncs your audiobooks and your physical ones
news.summary: Spotify has launched a new feature called Page Match that lets you quickly sync your spot in a physical or ebook with an audiobook. news.title: Spotify is partnering with Bookshop.org to sell physical books
news.summary: Spotify is going all in on books in 2026 and partnering with Bookshop.org to let you buy physical copies of audiobooks and support local retailers starting in the Spring. news.title: Substack data breach exposed users’ emails and phone numbers
news.summary: Substack is notifying some users that the email addresses and phone numbers linked to their accounts were exposed in a "security incident" last year. news.title: Google’s annual revenue tops $400 billion for the first time
news.summary: Google's parent company, Alphabet, has earned more than $400 billion in annual revenue for the first time.
